common.offline: You're offline. Changes will sync when you reconnect.

install.title: Install Partage
install.description: Install for offline access and better performance
install.iosInstructions: Tap the share button and select 'Add to Home Screen'

setup.title: Welcome to Partage
setup.subtitle: Split bills with friends, family, and groups
setup.privacy: Fully encrypted and private. Your data stays on your device.
setup.generateDescription: We'll create a unique cryptographic key pair to secure your data.
setup.generateDescriptionExtra: This process only takes a few seconds.
setup.keysStored: Your keys are stored securely on this device only.

login.title: Sign In
login.subtitle: Login to create groups
login.registerSubtitle: Create an account to start creating groups
login.description: Authentication is required to create new groups. Joining existing groups doesn't require login.
login.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
login.privacyNote: Your expense data remains encrypted on your device. Authentication only protects group creation.

groups.title: Your Groups
groups.subtitle: Select a group or create a new one
groups.noGroupsMessage: Create your first group to start tracking expenses
groups.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this group? This action cannot be undone.

createGroup.title: Create a Group
createGroup.subtitle: Set up a new group to track shared expenses
createGroup.currencyHint: All balances will be calculated in this currency

joinGroup.title: Join Group
joinGroup.invalidLinkMessage: The invite link is invalid or has expired.
joinGroup.alreadyMember: You are already a member of this group
joinGroup.selectIdentity: How would you like to join?
joinGroup.newMemberDescription: Join as a completely new member
joinGroup.existingMemberDescription: Claim an existing virtual member identity
joinGroup.claimIdentityNote: Claiming this identity will link your transactions under this name
joinGroup.duplicateName: A member with this name already exists
joinGroup.linkExpired: This invite link has expired. Please request a new one.

banner.unknownUserDetails: This device does not match any member of the group. This can happen if your browser's storage was cleared, or if you imported a group save on another device with a different identity. Please use an invite link to re-join the group.

balance.title: Balance Overview
balance.noBalancesMessage: Add expenses to see balance calculations and settlement suggestions

settle.title: Settlement Suggestions
settle.subtitle: Optimized plan to settle all balances
settle.description: These settlements minimize the total number of transactions needed
settle.noBalancesMessage: Add expenses to see balance calculations
settle.noSettlementMessage: Add expenses to see settlement suggestions
settle.suggestionsDescription: Optimized plan to settle all balances with minimum transactions
settle.preferencesDescription: Configure who each member prefers to send money to when settling up
settle.noPreferencesSet: No preferences set. Settlement will optimize for minimum transactions.
settle.preferencesHelp: Select members to prefer for sending money. Order matters - members higher in the list will be prioritized.
settle.tip: Tip: These settlements minimize the total number of transactions needed

entries.title: Entries
entries.noEntriesMessage: Tap the + button below to add your first expense or transfer
entries.noResultsMessage: No entries match your current filters
entries.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?
entries.deleteNote: This action can be undone later.
entries.duplicateTooltip: This entry was edited concurrently by multiple members. Review both versions and delete the incorrect one.

expenseForm.title: New Expense
expenseForm.payerAmountRequired: All payers must have a valid amount
expenseForm.payerTotalMismatch: Total paid ({paid}) must equal expense amount ({amount})
expenseForm.selectBeneficiary: Please select at least one beneficiary
expenseForm.beneficiaryAmountRequired: All beneficiaries must have a valid amount
expenseForm.beneficiaryTotalMismatch: Total assigned ({assigned}) must equal expense amount ({amount})
expenseForm.createFailed: Failed to create expense. Please try again.
expenseForm.updateFailed: Failed to update expense. Please try again.

transferForm.title: New Transfer
transferForm.fromRequired: Please select who is sending the transfer
transferForm.toRequired: Please select who is receiving the transfer
transferForm.sameFromTo: Sender and receiver must be different
transferForm.createFailed: Failed to create transfer. Please try again.
transferForm.updateFailed: Failed to update transfer. Please try again.

members.title: Members
members.virtualMemberDescription: Add a virtual member for tracking expenses without them joining the group directly.
members.cannotRemove: Cannot remove member with non-zero balance
members.duplicateName: A member with this name already exists
members.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove {name} from the group? They will be marked as departed but will remain in the audit history.

groupInfo.title: Group Info
groupInfo.subtitle: Subtitle
groupInfo.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g., Expenses for our trip to Barcelona
groupInfo.linkRequiredFields: Both label and URL are required

invite.title: Invite Members
invite.description: Share this link to invite others to join the group
invite.linkExpiry: This link gives full access to the group
invite.securityWarningMessage: Only share this link with trusted recipients. It contains the key to join the group and decrypt the entire group history.

activity.title: Activity
activity.noActivityMessage: Activity will appear here as group members make changes
activity.noActivityFiltered: No activities match your current filters

export.title: Export
export.noGroupsSelected: Please select at least one group to export

about.title: About
about.greeting: Hi! Thanks for using this app, I hope you like it!
about.motivation: It was born out of frustration from using other similar bill sharing apps.
about.privacyInfo: , and it respects your privacy. No one except the members of your groups can know what your personal expenses are, because all data is encrypted end-to-end.
about.serverCosts: I'm currently maintaining the server storing the encrypted group messages. It's not a lot, but if many use it, the costs could grow and/or the service performance degrade.
about.donationRequest: So if you want to help me continue building and maintaining cool open source projects, please consider making small donations.
about.githubInfo: The most convenient and cheapest way to donate (no fees!). Just sign in with GitHub or Google.
about.feedbackInfo: If you have questions or suggestions, head to the discussions section of the repository.

notifications.enableDescription: Get notified when expenses are added or your balances change
notifications.ntfyDescription: To receive notifications when the app is closed, subscribe to this URL using the NTFY app:
notifications.ntfyHint: Install NTFY on your phone, then subscribe to this URL to get notifications even when Partage is closed.
